desc: Probable 25% damage reduction & negates Def ignoring damage

dictionary.lore: A legendary divine vestment given to a cleric who had gone on a pilgrimage to all of the temples of Grand Gaia when the cleric was summoned to a sacred area. It has the power to heighten the spiritual powers of its wearer, and to purify all apparitions that attack the wearer. It is said that the cleric accepted the vestments, but returned them after bowing deeply and speaking a single word. Upon hearing this, the gods granted the cleric divine powers in place of the vestments.

name: White Vestments
